com.mockrunner.example.struts

Class AuthenticationActionTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mockrunner.base.BasicWebTestCase
      • com.mockrunner.base.BasicHTMLOutputTestCase
        • com.mockrunner.struts.BasicActionTestCaseAdapter
          • com.mockrunner.example.struts.AuthenticationActionTest

  • public class AuthenticationActionTest
extends BasicActionTestCaseAdapter
    Example test for the AuthenticationAction. Demonstrates most of the features of ActionTestModule and BasicActionTestCaseAdapter.
